text: is an animator and director from Japan. He first worked on the show Neon Genesis Evangelion in 1995. He also worked on FLCL. He also directed the movie Dead Leaves and the giant robot show Tengen Toppan Gurren Lagann. His style of animation is wild and fast. Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tokyo Category:Japanese animators
title: Hiroyuki Imaishi
